column1: 1. Change "Analysis Month" (cell B5) to view different time periods
2. Green checkmarks (‚úì) = on track Yellow warnings (‚ö†) = attention needed Red alerts (üî¥) = urgent
3. Use Quick Actions links to navigate to detailed sheets
5. Update Assumptions sheet monthly with actual data
1. MRR Growth (Line chart): Months 1-36 vs MRR
2. Customer Acquisition (Stacked area): Hustler SME Business Enterprise
3. Cash Flow Waterfall (Waterfall chart): Revenue COGS OpEx = Net Cash
4. Gross Margin Trend (Combo chart): Revenue vs Margin%
5. Unit Economics Gauges: LTV:CAC Gross Margin Churn Rate
- Headers: Dark gray background (#666666) white text
- Alerts section: Light red background (#F4CCCC) if critical
